title: Cozy Room
content:
一个极简主义风格的房间，
阳光透过白色的窗帘洒在地板上，
房间里有一把舒适的椅子和一株绿植，
色彩柔和，充满宁静的氛围。
4k分辨率，高细节。

title: Game Icon
content: game achievement icon, pixel art style, an open golden metallic tome or spellbook, minimalist UI design, micro-relief effect showing bulky texture of metal pages and cover, reflective gold pixel texture, resting on a dark navy blue shield-shaped background, detailed decorative golden pixel frame, classic game interface icon --ar 1:1

title: Cyberpunk City
content: A futuristic city skyline at night, raining, neon lights reflecting on the wet pavement, cyberpunk style, high detail, cinematic lighting.

title: Castle
content: game achievement icon, pixel art style, 8-bit aesthetic, a golden metallic castle fortress with towers, minimalist UI design, micro-relief effect created by pixel shading and highlights, gleaming gold texture, set against a solid dark blue shield-shaped background, exquisite pixelated golden ornate border surrounding the shield, clean retro game interface element, isometric view --ar 1:1
